home_page.title: Welcome to
home_page.name: Jawa Design !
home_page.presentation: I'm a web developer passionate about creating elegant and efficient websites. I use my design skills to craft user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces that enhance the user experience.

subtitles.A: Need an extra boost for your team?
subtitles.C: Curious to explore my innovative projects ?
subtitles.D: Ready to take action? Let's go !

texts.A: Look no further, I'm here to help. With my expertise and my commitment, I am ready to collaborate with you to meet your specific needs. Whether for a short-term project or a long-term collaboration, I am able to provide suitable solutions. Find out about my background and how my passion for coding has grown over time. You will understand why I am now fully committed to the creation of innovative digital solutions.
texts.B: I offer solutions to create a powerful and professional site. Thanks to my expertise in web development, I can design an attractive user interface, optimized for an exceptional user experience. From design to deployment, I am committed to providing you with a website that meets your expectations. Discover my services and let me accompany you in the creation of a website that will captivate your audience.
texts.C: Explore a selection of achievements that reflect my creativity and my passion for web development. Each project is carefully designed, combining aesthetics and advanced features to provide unique online experiences. Whether it's showcase sites, interactive applications or experimental projects, you will find a diversity of inspiration and innovative ideas. Immerse yourself in this captivating universe and find out how I can bring your own bold ideas to life.
texts.D: Whether you have questions, ideas, or just want to discuss your project, I'm here to help. Together we can turn your ideas into reality. I look forward to working with you and creating something exceptional. Don't delay, contact me now and let's start this exciting adventure together.

about_page.title: About Me
about_page.intro: I am a passionate web developer who has acquired a solid experience in designing and developing websites. I have worked on various projects, ranging from corporate websites to more creative personal projects, allowing me to develop strong skills in programming languages ​​such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, allowing me to code in ReactJs, NodeJs and many more...
about_page.introBis: I am also comfortable with design tools such as Figma, which allows me to create modern, elegant and user-friendly user interfaces. If you are looking for a passionate and talented web developer for your next project, I am the person for you.

figma.title: Figma
figma.text: Figma enables real-time collaboration, makes it easy to create interactive mockups, and offers advanced design features to create high-quality designs.

html.title: HTML 5
html.text: A good command of the semantic structure in HTML can help search engines to better understand the content of a website, thus improving its natural referencing (SEO) and its accessibility for users.

css.title: CSS 3
css.text: Offers near-endless possibilities to create original and aesthetically pleasing designs, as well as unique and engaging user experiences through its advanced customization features.

javascript.title: Javascript
javascript.text: Adds dynamism and interactivity, improving user experience and website engagement

react.title: React JS
react.text: Creates user interfaces that are interactive, responsive and easy to maintain.

node.title: Node JS
node.text: Create high-performance, scalable server-side applications with great flexibility and a wide range of libraries and modules.

redux.title: Redux
redux.text: Create more efficient and productive React web applications by automating some common tasks

sass.title: Sass
sass.text: Generates optimized and cross-browser compatible CSS style sheets, which can improve website performance.

mongo.title: Mongo DB
mongo.text: Provides great scalability and superior performance for data storage in web applications, thanks to its NoSQL framework.

mysql.title: MySQL
mysql.text: Offre une grande stabilité, des performances élevées et une grande sécurité pour le stockage de données dans les applications web.

stackBg.Alt: A hand, underwater, in direction of the sun

A.title: Professional training
A.text: In order to realize my project, I followed an intensive six-month training at OpenClassrooms to strengthen my basic skills necessary for programming. This training allowed me to focus my career as a web developer and work on exciting projects, including the creation of my own website.

B.title: Self-taught training
B.text: I started writing simple programs in VBA for a professional project, then, out of passion, I took online courses to deepen my knowledge of programming, especially in web languages. Over time I developed my skills and my passion for coding eventually led me here.

A.title: Jawa-design Website
A.text: This website is very personal to me as I have tried to bring my personality and story into every element of its design. Even if it doesn't necessarily seem like it, every design choice and every line of code has been influenced by my personal experiences and preferences. I wanted this site to be a true representation of who I am as a web developer and artist. I hope you enjoy browsing this site as much as I enjoyed creating it.

B.title: Web Application : Spyde.fr
B.text: I developed a complete web application, for my client Spyde, with secure and automatic access, user profiles to manage clients and employees, an editable and customizable blog, a client location system and upcoming collections, the simplified creation of roadmaps, recording of collected weights and customer information at each stage of recycling, as well as a dashboard of the main indicators. The project required the acquisition of various skills, such as the management of MapBox maps or the deepening of my knowledge in Node Js.

C.title: Creation Jawa Design
C.text: This project marks an important turning point in my professional career, which I started a few years ago, since I started as an independent developer. I am proud to have transformed my passion for web development into a professional activity. I am aware that the challenge is daunting, but my past experience as a self-taught developer, but also my various collaborations and professional experiences, have allowed me to acquire solid skills, whether in programming or in project management. . I am enthusiastic about the idea of ​​continuing this entrepreneurial adventure and putting my skills at your service.

D.title: Les Ecuries du Landran
D.text: I had the opportunity to create the first online site of a stable owned by friends. Although not a major project, it allowed me to practice my passion and web development skills while having a real impact for my friends. This experience also allowed me to gain confidence and continue to develop my skills in this area.

A.title: Branding and Design : Spyde.fr
A.text: My first professional project, as a freelancer, was for the start-up Spyde, which specializes in waste recycling. I carried out the branding and the web design of their web application, which was a major project, requiring a wide variety of skills, since I was also responsible for developing the Spyde.fr web application. This experience was very enriching for me and allowed me to develop my skills in web design and development.

B.title: Girondins Poker
B.text: I was responsible for the visual communication part for the Girondins Poker association club, for which I created several posters for tournaments, designed the club's chips and produced other graphic creations, such as videos or montages photo. This experience allowed me to broaden my design skills and develop a more creative vision of my projects.

C.title: Personal creations
C.text: Since my childhood, I have always had a pencil in my hand to draw and I have done many personal artistic projects, such as drawings, photographs, videos, montages, etc. This passion for art has allowed me to broaden my creative vision and develop design skills that have been very useful to me in my work as a web developer.

A.title: To the code
A.text: When I returned to France, I then took the time to reflect on my skills and my passions in order to consider a new career direction. Web development then became obvious to me. After a short reflection, I embark on this new adventure.

B.title: Dive Instructor
B.text: After working for several years, I realized that I was not completely satisfied with my professional life and needed to change direction. I then decided to follow another passion that I had nurtured for a long time, scuba diving. So I went to Thailand to pass my diving levels and obtain the diving instructor diploma at the beginning of February 2020...

C.title: Project Manager
C.text: I acquired significant experience as a project manager in an international biorefinery company specialized in the production of specialty cellulose, Rayonier AM. This experience allowed me to learn more about project management, team management and other useful skills for my current job as a developer.

D.title: Various experiences
D.text: At the start of my career, I held various positions in the industrial sector. I started working in the workshop and then became an industrial designer in several companies specializing in this field. This experience allowed me to acquire many drawing skills and to improve myself in this field.

E.title: Associate degree Training
E.text: My initial career was marked by obtaining a Associate degree in boilermaking. Although it is not directly related to web development, this training allowed me to develop skills in technical drawing. I was quickly seduced by the aspect of design and realization of projects, which I find today with the code.

elementA.title: Blog
elementA.text: Personalized and editable blogs, created especially to meet your needs.

elementB.title: Web application
elementB.text: Applications customized to your needs, not according to a predefined model.

elementC.title: Showcase site
elementC.text: Promote your products or services with a professional and impactful online presentation.

elementD.title: Freelance worker
elementD.text: Need reinforcement for your team? I offer my services as a telecommuting freelancer.

elementE.title: Original creation
elementE.text: An atypical or innovative idea? Let's discuss it!

elementF.title: Branding
elementF.text: Design of the graphic universe of your company.

elementG.title: Portfolio
elementG.text: Exhibit your art online with style and originality.

titleB.title: Write me directly here
titleB.subtitle: I'm very responsive to your messages

questions.default: What do you want to discuss?
questions.option2: I need a developer for a mission

email.errorB: Failed to send, try again or contact me via social media

A.title: Customizable
A.text: I specialize in the creation of tailor-made blogs that allow my clients to have a unique and personalized site in their image. Each blog is designed with the specific needs and preferences of my clients in mind, ensuring a distinctive and memorable online presence.

B.title: Editable
B.text: Along with customization, my blogs provide a simple and functional interface for my clients to easily edit their site. They have a user-friendly dashboard that allows them to update their content, add new pages, manage comments and much more. Thanks to this flexibility, my clients have full control over the management and evolution of their blog, without the need for advanced technical skills.

C.title: SEO optimized
C.text: Search engine optimization (SEO) is a priority in the creation of my blogs. I use Next.js, a powerful technology, to optimize the natural referencing of each site. This allows my clients to benefit from increased visibility in search results and attract qualified traffic. With an optimized site structure, well-thought-out meta tags, and careful attention to keywords, my blogs are designed to achieve higher search engine rankings and maximize their online potential. Feel free to contact me if you want to learn more about my bespoke blogging, user-friendly editing, and SEO optimization services.

A.title: Dynamism
A.text: My skills in web development with React.js allow me to create tailor-made applications for my clients, thus offering a dynamic and responsive experience. Thanks to the power of React.js and an adapted code, my applications are able to adapt to all types of devices, whether it is a smartphone, a tablet or a large screen of computer. Regardless of the screen size, my apps retain their functionality and aesthetics, providing a smooth and enjoyable user experience.

B.title: Data management
B.text: When designing my applications, I take into account the specific data management needs of my clients. I can set up SQL (mySQL) or NoSQL (MongoDB) databases depending on the project requirements and the flexibility desired by the client. SQL databases offer solid structure and tight data management, while NoSQL databases offer increased flexibility for projects requiring rapid scalability and less structured data schemas. I work closely with my clients to define storage and data management needs to ensure a high performance and scalable application.

C.title: Server
C.text: To complement my web applications, I also create REST API servers with Node.js, allowing smooth communication between the UI and the database. Thanks to Node.js, I can develop fast and scalable servers that can handle requests and responses efficiently. REST APIs offer a flexible and modular architecture, allowing to add new functionalities and to connect third-party services if necessary. I ensure that my API servers are secure and well documented, making it easy to integrate with other systems and services. Do not hesitate to contact me if you want to know more about my custom web application development services with React.js, database management and creation of REST API servers with Node.js. I would be happy to discuss your specific needs and show you how my expertise can help you achieve high-performance and functional applications.

A.title: Design
A.text: My goal is to create showcase sites that perfectly reflect the identity and values ​​of my clients. I work closely with them to understand their design needs and expectations. I can create custom sites following their own designs or design original designs that showcase their business. Thanks to my mastery of HTML, CSS and Javascript, I am able to create aesthetic and intuitive interfaces that capture the attention of visitors and encourage them to explore further.

B.title: Dynamism
B.text: My showcase sites are designed to offer a fluid and adapted user experience on all devices. Thanks to the use of Javascript, I bring dynamism to the page, allowing to add animations, fluid transitions and engaging interactions. This ensures that your visitors will have a consistent and enjoyable experience, regardless of the device used to access the site.

C.title: SEO optimized
C.text: Search engine optimization is an essential aspect of my showcase sites. I pay particular attention to the HTML structure of each page, using semantic tags and appropriate metadata to facilitate indexing by search engines. Additionally, I optimize site performance by ensuring that load times are reduced and optimizing images and assets for a better user experience. Finally, I implement SEO best practices such as creating relevant title tags, engaging meta descriptions, and optimizing for relevant keywords. This helps improve your site's visibility on search engines and drive more organic traffic.

A.title: Adaptability
A.text: As a freelancer in web development, I fully adapt to the needs of my clients. Whether it is for a short-term collaboration or a one-time reinforcement, I am flexible and ready to meet their specific requirements. My goal is to provide a personalized service that perfectly matches their expectations.

B.title: By the day
B.text: Do you need a web developer for a day or just a few days? I offer daily services, which allows you to benefit from my skills and expertise for specific periods. This approach offers great flexibility in planning your projects and allows you to maximize the efficiency of your team. Plus, with a competitive daily rate, you have full control over your budget.

C.title: Package
C.text: Prefer an all-inclusive package approach? I also offer fixed-price services, ideal for well-defined and targeted tasks. With this option, you benefit from clear and transparent pricing, with no surprises or hidden costs. In addition, you have the advantage of knowing in advance the delivery times and the budget necessary for your project. This method simplifies management and facilitates decision-making, allowing you to focus on other aspects of your business. Whatever your preference, I am here to accompany you and provide you with a quality service, adapted to your specific needs.

A.title: Inspiration
A.text: You have an idea ? An atypical or innovative site? I am here to study with you all your questions. I understand that you may have questions about the feasibility, technical challenges or even the viability of your project. Together, we will explore these aspects and find solutions adapted to your specific needs.

B.title: Accompaniement
B.text: My role as a passionate web developer is to help you deepen your idea and develop it. I am here to accompany you throughout the process, bringing you my technical expertise and my skills in web design. I am committed to finding creative and innovative solutions to realize your vision, taking into account your objectives, your constraints and your budget.

C.title: Exchange
C.text: Do not hesitate to come and discuss your ideas with me. I am open and enthusiastic about collaborating with creative and ambitious minds. Together, we can explore the possibilities and define a strategy to carry out your project efficiently and successfully. I am here to guide, advise and support you throughout the web development process. So go ahead and contact me today so we can bring your atypical or innovative idea to life.

A.title: Graphic identity
A.text: You are well aware of the importance of the image that we send back to the world today. My goal is to help my clients shape a unique and memorable brand image. By working closely with them, I immerse myself in their universe to understand their activity, their values ​​and their target audience. From this information, I create impactful logos that reflect the very essence of their business. In parallel, I develop a complete graphic charter which defines the rules of use of the visual elements. I help my clients stand out from the competition by creating a distinctive visual identity in line with their vision.

B.title: Web design
B.text: In addition to the creation of graphic identity, I also offer my services for the realization of web designs in line with this identity. I ensure that the design of the website is in harmony with the new graphic identity of the company, thus creating a coherent and impactful user experience. Whether it's for the layout, the choice of colors, typography and visual elements, I pay attention to the smallest details to offer an attractive and professional web design.

C.title: Personalization
C.text: In addition, I offer the customization of different corporate documents to align the online visual identity with the real visual identity. This includes creating professional business cards, document letterheads, goodies, and other necessary communication materials. Each document is thought out in such a way as to reinforce the visual coherence of the company and to transmit its message in an impactful way. I am here to support you in the customization of these different elements for a global and coherent visual identity.

A.title: Need visibility ?
A.text: Visibility is essential these days to succeed in the artistic field. That's why I specialize in creating custom portfolios for artists, models, singers, musicians, cooks, graphic designers and more. My clients need visual support that showcases their talents and work, and I'm here to help them stand out in an ever-changing digital world.

B.title: Strengthen your image
B.text: By collaborating closely with my clients, I create tailor-made portfolios that reflect their universe and their style. I immerse myself in their history, their aspirations and their achievements to design a portfolio that captures the very essence of their talent. I ensure that each element of the portfolio, be it layout, images, texts or videos, is carefully chosen to enhance the image of my clients and attract the attention of visitors.

C.title: In complete confidence
C.text: When you work with me, you can trust my client-centric approach. I take the time to listen carefully to your needs and aspirations, in order to create a portfolio that authentically represents you. I am committed to providing a personalized and high quality service, with an emphasis on the satisfaction of my customers. You can count on my creativity, my professionalism and my passion for art to help you develop your image and stand out in the creative industry. Trust me to create a portfolio that will help you achieve your goals and captivate your audience.

A.title: SPYDE
A.text: Spyde is a company specializing in the collection and recycling of waste from businesses and communities. I carried out the entire project, from creating the logo to putting their web application online. Together we have developed an effective system to optimize waste management and promote sustainability.

B.title: JAWA DESIGN
B.text: This website represents my personal brand, JAWA Design. I designed the site to reflect my personality. It showcases my skills and showcases the unique approach I bring to web design. I hope you enjoy it browsing it, as much as I enjoyed designing and shaping it.

C.title: GOLDEN BOOK
C.text: I developed a specific web application for a wedding. This application functions as a digital guestbook, offering the possibility to the guests to share their wishes and their photos taken during the ceremony. What makes this application unique is that it allows guests to participate without cutting themselves off from the evening and the bride and groom to keep a good memory!

D.title: TRAINING OC
D.text: Here are some projects I did during my training at OpenClassrooms. Although they were made during my training, these projects testify to my commitment to strictly respect the instructions and expectations in terms of design of each client. Each project highlights the skills and techniques that I have acquired during my training.

E.title: GIRONDINS
E.text: I was an active member and responsible for the visual communication of Girondins Poker, a poker association in the Gironde region. I realized, among other things, logos, tokens, posters for tournaments, flyers, etc. My work has contributed to strengthening the association's image and attracting participants to their events.

projects.endMessage: In addition to these projects, I am preparing new ones which will soon be available here. Some of these projects will focus on artificial intelligence, harnessing its capabilities to create innovative solutions. Other projects will be more oriented towards design, in particular sites integrating 3D.

error_project.text: This page is not yet available. If you wish to be alerted of its publication, please send me a message by clicking on the button below.

titles.A: Editing and Development of the site

text.A2: Adress : 18, allée de la lisière du golf 33260 La Teste de Buch FRANCE
text.C1: This website uses several web languages ​​(HTML, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, etc.). We recommend using modern browsers for the best user experience and pleasant graphics, such as Google Chrome, Firefox , Safari, etc.
text.C2: Jawa Design makes every effort to provide reliable information and to keep its websites up to date. However, errors or omissions may occur. Therefore, it is important that the user checks the accuracy of the information with jawa-design.com and report any necessary changes to the address contact@jawa-design.com The company declines all responsibility for the use of this information and cannot be held liable for any direct or indirect damage that would result.
text.C3: Cookies: The jawa-design.com site may request your acceptance of cookies for statistical and display purposes. A cookie is information placed on your hard drive by the server of the site you are visiting. It contains different data stored on your computer in a simple text file, which a server can access to read and record information. Some parts of this site may not function properly without the acceptance of cookies.
text.C4: Hypertext links: The jawa-design.com website may contain links to other sites or resources available on the Internet. The www.jawa-design.com website has no way of controlling these sites. linked.
text.C5: Jawa Design does not guarantee the availability of these sites and external resources, nor is it responsible for them. It declines all responsibility for damages, of any nature whatsoever, resulting from the content of these sites or external sources , including the information, products or services they offer, or any use that may be made of them.The risks associated with this use are entirely the responsibility of the user, who must comply with the conditions of use of these sites. Users, subscribers and visitors to the websites are not authorized to establish a hypertext link to this site without the express and prior authorization of the developer.
text.C6: If a user or visitor wishes to establish a hypertext link to one of the websites of www.jawa-design.com, it is up to him to send an e-mail accessible on the site to request the setting place of such a link. Jawa Design reserves the right to accept or refuse this request for a hypertext link, without having to justify its decision.
text.D1: All of our company's activities and related information are presented on our website www.jawa-design.com. At Jawa Design, we strive to provide information that is as accurate as possible. However, please note that the information on the site is not exhaustive and that the photos are not contractual. They are subject to modifications since their publication. In addition, all the information provided is indicative and may change or evolve without notice.
text.D2: Contractual limitation on data: We strive to make the information on this site as accurate as possible and to update it at different times of the year. However, it may contain inaccuracies or omissions. If you notice a gap, an error or a malfunction, we invite you to report it to us by email at contact@jawa-design.com, describing the problem in detail (page concerned, type of computer and browser used, etc.).
text.D3: Any content downloaded is the responsibility of the user and is done at his own risk. Accordingly, we assume no liability for any damage to the user's computer or loss of data resulting from the In addition, the user of the site undertakes to access it using recent equipment, free of viruses and up to date with the latest versions of browsers.The hypertext links established to other resources present on the Internet from our site can not engage the responsibility of www.jawa-design.com.
text.E1: The entire content of this site www.jawa-design.com, including but not limited to graphics, images, text, videos, animations, sounds, logos, gifs and icons, as well as their formatting, are the exclusive property of our company, with the exception of trademarks, logos or content belonging to other partner companies or authors.
text.E2: Any reproduction, distribution, modification, adaptation, retransmission or publication, even partial, of these various elements is strictly prohibited without our express agreement in writing at Jawa Design. Such representation or reproduction, by any process whatsoever , constitutes an infringement, punishable by articles L.335-2 and following of the Intellectual Property Code Failure to comply with this prohibition constitutes a violation of copyright, which may result in civil and criminal liability for the offender. In addition, the owners of the copied content may take legal action against you.
text.F1: In accordance with law 78-17 of January 6, 1978 (amended by law 2004-801 of August 6, 2004 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data) concerning the information technology, files and freedoms, this site has been duly declared under number 1656629 to the National Commission for Information Technology and Freedoms (CNIL) (www.cnil.fr). We are therefore committed to respecting the standards and regulations in force regarding the protection of personal data.
text.G1: The conditions of use of the site www.jawa-design.com are subject to French law. Any dispute or dispute arising from the interpretation or execution of these conditions will fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts territorially authorities of the company's registered office. The language used to settle any disputes is French.
text.H1: In general, during your visit to our website www.jawa-design.com, you are not obliged to communicate your personal data to us. However, certain exceptions apply. For example, for certain services that we offer on our site, such as the contact form, you may be required to provide us with information such as your surname, first name, e-mail address and telephone number.
text.H2: Please be aware that you always have the option of refusing to provide your personal data. However, this may limit your use of certain services on the site, such as requesting information about our company or receiving our newsletters. information. However, you can contact us via social networks or by email at contact@jawa-design.com.
text.H3: Furthermore, during your navigation on our site, certain information concerning you may be collected automatically, such as data on the use of the site, the pages visited, your IP address, the type of browser used and access times. This information is used exclusively for internal statistical purposes to improve the quality of the services we offer. The databases are protected in accordance with the law of July 1, 1998 transposing directive 96/9 of March 11, 1996 on the legal protection of databases.
text.H4: We also use performance and statistics cookies, such as those provided by Google Analytics, to collect information on the use of the site (number of visits, pages viewed, visitor activity). These cookies help us to identify and solve problems with the functioning of the site, as well as to improve it. The data collected is kept for a period of 3 months, unless you wish to delete it. In this case, please send us an e-mail. email to contact@jawa-design.com.
